com.audiophile.t2m.text

Class TextAnalyser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.audiophile.t2m.text.TextAnalyser

  • public class TextAnalyser
extends java.lang.Object
    A group of functions that break a text apart and analyse it.

    • Method Detail

      • analyseSentences

        public static Sentence[] analyseSentences(java.lang.String text)
        This function splits the text into Sentences and Words. Then Every word is linked with its corresponding entry in the database. All fill words are marked with WordFilter
        Parameters:
        text - The plain text as String
        Returns:
        The text split into sentences
        See Also:
        DatabaseHandler.FindWord(String, double), splitSentences(String)

      • getAvgWordLength

        public static float[] getAvgWordLength(Sentence[] sentences)
        Stores the average word length for every sentence in an array.
        Parameters:
        sentences - The text split into sentences
        Returns:
        Array with average word length per sentence

      • getAvgWordTendency

        public static Word.Tendency getAvgWordTendency(Sentence[] sentences)
        Calculates the average word tendency for the hole text.
        Parameters:
        sentences - The text split into sentences
        Returns:
        the average word tendency as Word.Tendency
